global.description: Generate types in the global namespace with T prefix

clear.description: Clear the output directory before generating types

jsonTypeMapping.description: Enable JSON type mapping using PrismaType namespace. When enabled, creates a PrismaType namespace with Json interface. Json fields will use PrismaType.Json instead of Record<string, unknown>

namespaceName.description: Custom namespace name for JSON type mapping. When jsonTypeMapping is enabled, this namespace will be used instead of the default 'PrismaType'

jsDocComments.description: Generate JSDoc comments from Prisma schema comments

splitFiles.description: Split output into separate files per model/enum. Cannot be used together with splitBySchema

barrelExports.description: Generate barrel exports (index.ts). When splitBySchema is enabled, this controls whether index.ts exports everything

splitBySchema.description: Split types by schema file names. When enabled, generates separate files for each schema file (post.ts, user.ts, etc.). Models are matched by name prefix (Post* -> post.ts, User* -> user.ts). schema.prisma generates index.ts. Cannot be used together with splitFiles
